query.nsql: SELECT @SELECT:DIM:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:THEME:Priority:PRIORITY_1@, @SELECT:METRIC:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:Counts:COUNTS:COUNTS@ FROM (SELECT count(bps.ID) COUNTS , cmn_lookups_v.Name PRIORITY FROM cmn_lookups, odf_mappings, cmn_lookups_v ,(SELECT id, ((rqp_requirements.PRIORITY_1 + rqp_requirements.PRIORITY_2 + rqp_requirements.PRIORITY_3 + rqp_requirements.PRIORITY_4) / 4.000000) bpval FROM rqp_requirements WHERE RQP_REQUIREMENTS.RELEASE_ID = @where:param:xml:integer:/data/id/@value@) bps WHERE cmn_lookups.LOOKUP_TYPE= 'ODF.OBJECT.REQUIREMENT.RQP_REQ_PRIORITY' and cmn_lookups.LOOKUP_CODE= odf_mappings.MAPPING_CODE and odf_mappings.TYPE_CODE= cmn_lookups_v.LOOKUP_CODE and cmn_lookups_v.language_code = @WHERE:PARAM:LANGUAGE@ and cmn_lookups_v.lookup_type = 'ODF_IMAGES' and bps.bpval between odf_mappings.LO and odf_mappings.HI group by cmn_lookups_v.Name ) reqInfo WHERE @FILTER@
